page.title: 03Hartside School.
page.content: Hartside County Junior and Infant Mixed School is less than five years old being built to ease the number problem at the school in the town centre. The school has around 210 pupils from 5 to 11 years old with seven classes at present. They have a staff of seven full time teachers as well as the headmaster and a teacher for Remedial teaching for half a week. The pupils come from the Low Mown Meadows housing estate and from the Barratt development over the main road while there are a few pupils from the town centre. The school has a large hall for dining and play as well as a large field next to the school.
